item.title: I’m killing my blog
item.dc:creator: Hugo
item.description:
Hey! If you have been reading my blog I would like to thank you. Today I will officially kill this website, don’t worry the blog as it stands will be archived on a github repository. The main reason I’m doing this is because I’ve achieved my 30 plus goal of running a blog, I will […]

The post I’m killing my blog appeared first on Hugo's Notes.
item.content:encoded:
Hey! If you have been reading my blog I would like to thank you. Today I will officially kill this website, don’t worry the blog as it stands will be archived on a github repository.

The main reason I’m doing this is because I’ve achieved my 30 plus goal of running a blog, I will still be writing but I will move to writing articles on my linkedin profile here: https://www.linkedin.com/in/heyiamhugo/

This will allow me to save more money and to hopefully increase engagement.

Thank you for reading here and I’ll see ya on linkedin ðŸ˜‰

The post I’m killing my blog appeared first on Hugo's Notes.
